item.title: Continuing the legacy of Robert W. Deutsch.
item.description: The Foundation exists because of the entrepreneurial success of Dr. Robert W. Deutsch. We honor the lifelong interests of Dr. Deutsch and his wife Florence with our support of innovative people, projects and ideas.

item.title: Dek
item.description: The Deutsch Foundation invests in innovative people, projects and ideas that improve the quality of life in Baltimore and beyond.

item.title: We’d love to hear about your big idea.
item.description: We welcome innovative ideas from individuals and organizations that are aligned with the Foundation’s values and interests, which include but are not limited to Science and Technology, Arts and Culture, Scholarships and Fellowships, Social Justice and Community Development.
